oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Band steaming for intra-row weed control in direct-sown vegetables
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Melander, Senior scientist Bo
Jørgensen, Scientist Martin Heide
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Weed management
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Recent results with band-steaming in organic vegetables are presented.
